name: Clay Soldiers
description:
Nu Wa conjures Clay Soldiers from the earth. If she marked a target while summoning them, they will pursue that target until it dies. If she summons them without target, they will attack enemy gods who damage Nu Wa, or closest enemies.
Soldiers live for 10s. First they will dash at enemies within 45 units, applying a stack of protection reduction. Stacks up to 3 times, stacks last 2s. They will basic attack after that.
stats: Soldier's Health: 200 (+20% of your maximum health)
Dash Magical Protection Reduction Per Stack: 4/8/12/16/20
